######
Alerts
######

To create an alert apply the following syntax to any of the commands bellow:

.. code-block:: html

    .. danger::

        danger


.. danger::

    danger


.. error::

    error


.. attention::

    attention


.. caution::

    caution


.. warning::

    warning


.. important::

    important


.. hint::

    hint


.. tip::

    tip


.. note::

    note


.. seealso::

    seealso
